trends: There have been 35 other sightings in St Petersburg
There were no other sightings in St Petersburg on or around March 25th 2011
Summary: faint white colored boomerang with bright light in the middle and many smaller lights
divs: sighting detailsme and my girlfriend decided to go to the beach for a late night walk. so we parked by ron jon surf shop and started walking towards the pier. as we got to the pier we sat down and talked for a while. when we started walking back we continued talking and looking at the stars, when she suddenly said " do you see that?!" as i looked at where she pointed i saw a huge boomerang shaped object at first i thought it was a spot light cause of its faint color but as we continued to look at it appeared to be a faint white color with a main large bright light in the middle surrounded with more smaller dimmer lights it moved at a fast rate of speed faster than a plane but it appeared to be "cruising" as it moved towards cape canaveral when it suddenly disappeared both me and my girlfriend saw the same thing and just stood there in shock i was kind of freaked out but amazed and ive had goosebumps since the sightings someone please let me know if you saw the same thing on 03\25-26\2011
